csr.uart.rx_trigger

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x4
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

UART Rx Trigger Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] read rw 0x0 csr.uart.rx_trigger.read

Field Descriptions

read - csr.uart.rx_trigger.read

Indicates that the CPU can accept next data transfer, used internally - don't try to read or write!
